date.description: Date for which the data is being reported

af_prt.description: AppsFlyer Partner Registration Token used for attribution

media_source.description: Source of media where the campaign was displayed

campaign.description: Campaign name or identifier for the marketing campaign

clicks.description: Total clicks generated by the campaign

conversion_type.description: Type of conversion (e.g., purchase, registration) tracked

conversion_rate.description: Percentage of clicks that resulted in a desired conversion

sessions.description: Total number of user sessions recorded

loyal_users.description: Count of users categorized as loyal based on defined criteria

loyal_users_rate.description: Percentage of users classified as loyal users

total_revenue.description: Total revenue generated from the campaign

total_cost.description: Overall cost incurred for running the campaign

return_on_investment.description: Ratio of total revenue to total cost, indicating ROI

average_ecpi.description: Average revenue earned per Install (Effective Cost Per Install)

account_login_unique_users.description: Count of unique users who performed account login actions

account_login_event_counter.description: Number of account login events tracked by the retargeting partner

account_login_sales.description: Total sales generated from users who logged into their account

af_complete_registration_unique_users.description: Number of unique users who successfully completed registration

af_complete_registration_event_counter.description: Number of complete registration events attributed to AppsFlyer

af_complete_registration_sales.description: Total sales value generated from users who completed registration

checkout_success_unique_users.description: Count of unique users who successfully completed a checkout

checkout_success_event_counter.description: Number of successful checkout events recorded

checkout_success_sales.description: Total sales revenue from successful checkout events

create_product_complete_unique_users.description: Count of unique users who finalized a product creation

create_product_complete_event_counter.description: Number of product creation events completed

create_product_complete_sales.description: Total sales from users who completed product creation

init_appsflyer_id_unique_users.description: Count of unique users who initialized AppsFlyer ID

init_appsflyer_id_event_counter.description: Number of events where AppsFlyer ID was initialized

init_appsflyer_id_sales.description: Total sales generated from users where AppsFlyer ID was initialized
